Title: Honeywell Home V4043H 1056 V4043H 1056 22Mm Zone Vlv 240V
Description: This V4043H motorised two port zone valve with 22mm compression connections is suitable for a variety of flow control applications in domestic and light commercial central heating systems. Positioned where it cannot block any vent or cold feed when closed, this valve can be plumbed at any angle but the powerhead should not be below the horizontal level of the pipework. If fitted in a confined space, ventilation must be available to keep the valve within its ambient temperature range and access should be available for removing the powerhead if required
category: Heating/Central Heating Controls/Central Heating Valves/Central Heating Valves.csv -> Honeywell Home V4043H 1056 V4043H 1056 22Mm Zone Vlv 240V

Title: Honeywell Home V4073A V4073A1039 V4073A 1039 22Mm Mid Pos Valve
Description: This V4073A motorised diverter valve with 22mm compression connections controls the flow of water in domestic central heating systems, where both radiator and hot water cylinder circuits are pumped. Suitable for small-to-medium sized installations, this mid-position diverter valve should be used in conjunction with a room thermostat and cylinder thermostat for full temperature control of a conventional, fully pumped central heating installation. This type of control system is known as Sundial Y Plan and components can be connected using the Sundial Plan Wiring Centre, including dedicated terminations with no need for a wiring diagram.
category: Heating/Central Heating Controls/Central Heating Valves/Central Heating Valves.csv -> Honeywell Home V4073A V4073A1039 V4073A 1039 22Mm Mid Pos Valve

Title: Drayton Auto Bypass Valve 07 02 020 DTB auto bypass valve 22mm
Description: This Drayton automatic bypass valve maintains a minimum flow rate in heating systems fitted with thermostatic radiator valves. When all TRVs are open, the bypass valve remains closed, allowing full boiler output to circulate, however when the TRVs sense that a selected room temperature is reached and start to close, the bypass valve opens, maintaining optimum flow and reducing the risk of damage to the boiler and pump. The valve can also minimise the noise created when flow decreases.

Title: Honeywell Home V4073A 1039 @ h/w v4073a 1039 22mm mid posn vlv pk
Description: This V4073A motorised diverter valve with 22mm compression connections controls the flow of water in domestic central heating systems, where both radiator and hot water cylinder circuits are pumped. Suitable for small-to-medium sized installations, this mid-position diverter valve should be used in conjunction with a room thermostat and cylinder thermostat for full temperature control of a conventional, fully pumped central heating installation. This type of control system is known as Sundial Y Plan and components can be connected using the Sundial Plan Wiring Centre, including dedicated terminations with no need for a wiring diagram.

Title: Honeywell Home V4043H 1056 @ h/w v4043h 1056 22mm zone vlv 240v pk
Description: This V4043H motorised two port zone valve with 22mm compression connections is suitable for a variety of flow control applications in domestic and light commercial central heating systems. Positioned where it cannot block any vent or cold feed when closed, this valve can be plumbed at any angle but the powerhead should not be below the horizontal level of the pipework. If fitted in a confined space, ventilation must be available to keep the valve within its ambient temperature range and access should be available for removing the powerhead if required
